markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=1569)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 337 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Abadar](/Deities.aspx?ID=277), [Phlegyas](/Deities.aspx?ID=546), [Vapula](/Deities.aspx?ID=532)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

**Area** 20-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You create an illusory visual image of a stationary object. The entire image must fit within the spell's area. The object appears to animate naturally, but it doesn't make sounds or generate smells. For example, water would appear to pour down an illusory waterfall, but it would be silent.

 Any creature that touches the image or uses the [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) action to examine it can attempt to disbelieve your illusion.

---
**Heightened (2nd)** Your image makes appropriate sounds, generates normal smells, and feels right to the touch. The spell gains the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) and [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246) traits. The duration increases to 1 hour.

**Heightened (5th)** As the 2nd-rank version, but the duration is unlimited.
name: Illusory Object

**Range** 500 feet

**Area** 20-foot burst

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Form a convincing illusion of an object.
</summary>
summary: Form a convincing illusion of an object.

text: Illusory Object Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 337 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Abadar, Phlegyas, Vapula Range 500 feet Area 20-foot burst Duration 10 minutes --- You create an illusory visual image of a stationary object. The entire image must fit within the spell's area. The object appears to animate naturally, but it doesn't make sounds or generate smells. For example, water would appear to pour down an illusory waterfall, but it would be silent. Any creature that touches the image or uses the Seek action to examine it can attempt to disbelieve your illusion. --- Heightened (2nd) Your image makes appropriate sounds, generates normal smells, and feels right to the touch. The spell gains the auditory and olfactory traits. The duration increases to 1 hour. Heightened (5th) As the 2nd-rank version, but the duration is unlimited.
